name: Troubled Waters (Team Puddlecat)
description:
A little water management game about collecting water from a dirty river and purifying it in various ways. There are many different technologies and techniques used to ensure that people have access to clean, safe water, and this is a gamified examination of those techniques. 

Made in Unity. Available for both Windows and Mac.

Art and programming done by GelatinousCat and Captain Puddleboat.
Font used: Tripfive by PixelMush
